subSubSection.paragraph: Isolated rostra from private collections: 11/1998 or earlier, Australia ( N = 1); 4/1999 or earlier, Arnhem Land, Australia ( N = 2); 10/2000 or earlier, Gulf of Papua, Papua New Guinea ( N = 1); unknown date, Bushehr , Iran ( N = 1); 1994 or earlier, unknown locality ( N = 3); 1999 or earlier, unknown locality ( N = 2).
Photograph of isolated rostrum from a private collection: Early 1980s or earlier, unknown locality ( N = 1).
